item.title: This Simple Trick Will Help You Instantly Master the Spelling of 'Tortilla'!
item.description: This Simple Trick Will Help You Instantly Master the Spelling of ‘Tortilla’! Have you ever been stumped by the spelling of a word? If so, you’re not alone! One of the most common spelling conundrums is the word ‘tortilla’. While it looks like it should be spelled ‘tortila’, the correct spelling is actually ‘tortilla’. Introduction The word ‘tortilla’ is a Spanish word for a thin, round flatbread made from corn or wheat flour.
